titles.title: Trust Through Transparency Act of 2025
Trust Through Transparency Act of 2025

To amend section 287 of the Immigration and Nationality Act to require all immigration enforcement officers to wear and operate a body camera during public-facing immigration enforcement actions and to promote transparency and accountability.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on Homeland Security, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
